basic.description:
Studies in literary topics that cross over the historical boundaries between Groups A, B, and C. For detailed information, consult the Department.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Topics in Literary Interpretation I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).
